blueprint.description: Installs VSCode on nearly any system and installs specified extensions
blueprint.overview: [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) is a freeware source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, code refactoring, and embedded Git.
blueprint.name: Visual Studio Code
blueprint.title: Visual Studio Code
